Title: Expands the definition of "minority group member" for purposes of participation by minority group members and women with respect to state contracts
Summary: Expands the definition of "minority group member" for purposes of participation by minority group members and women with respect to state contracts.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to expanding the definition of "minority group member" for purposes of participation by minority group members and women with respect to state contracts
